lo_entries.subject: MAT
lo_entries.lo_text: Understand place value, operations on whole numbers and simple fractions

lo_entries.subject: MAT
lo_entries.lo_text: Simplify algebraic expressions and solve simple linear equations

lo_entries.subject: MAT
lo_entries.lo_text: Solve quadratic equations by factorization and formula

lo_entries.subject: MAT
lo_entries.lo_text: Understand limits and basic differentiation concepts

lo_entries.subject: ENG
lo_entries.lo_text: Identify main ideas, supporting details, and infer meaning from short passages

lo_entries.subject: ENG
lo_entries.lo_text: Use vocabulary in context and deduce meanings of unfamiliar words

lo_entries.subject: BIO
lo_entries.lo_text: Describe the structure and function of plant and animal cells

lo_entries.subject: BIO
lo_entries.lo_text: Apply Mendel's laws to predict inheritance patterns

lo_entries.subject: CHEM
lo_entries.lo_text: Perform simple stoichiometric calculations and balance chemical equations

lo_entries.subject: PHY
lo_entries.lo_text: Describe displacement, velocity and acceleration and solve basic motion problems

lo_entries.subject: PHY
lo_entries.lo_text: Apply work-energy principles to simple systems and conservation of energy

lo_entries.subject: ICT
lo_entries.lo_text: Understand basic computer components, storage and software concepts

lo_entries.subject: ICT
lo_entries.lo_text: Write simple programs using variables, conditionals and loops

lo_entries.subject: CIV
lo_entries.lo_text: Describe rights and responsibilities of citizens and basics of governance

lo_entries.subject: AGRIC
lo_entries.lo_text: Understand basic crop husbandry practices and soil management

lo_entries.subject: CHEM
lo_entries.lo_text: Identify functional groups and name simple organic molecules

lo_entries.subject: ENG
lo_entries.lo_text: Plan and produce coherent essays with clear paragraphing and argument structure

lo_entries.subject: MAT
lo_entries.lo_text: Interpret averages, range and simple probability in problem contexts

lo_entries.subject: BIO
lo_entries.lo_text: Describe ecosystems, food chains and human impacts on the environment

lo_entries.subject: ENG
lo_entries.lo_text: Apply correct grammar, tense and sentence structure in writing and speech

lo_entries.subject: MAT
lo_entries.lo_text: Understand sine, cosine and tangent ratios for right-angled triangles

lo_entries.subject: PHY
lo_entries.lo_text: Analyze simple DC circuits using Ohm's law and series/parallel combinations

lo_entries.subject: CHEM
lo_entries.lo_text: Classify reactions and predict products for common reaction types

lo_entries.subject: AGRIC
lo_entries.lo_text: Explain soil composition, fertility and management practices

lo_entries.subject: ICT
lo_entries.lo_text: Understand basic networking concepts: LAN, WAN, IP addressing

lo_entries.subject: CIV
lo_entries.lo_text: Compare forms of government and explain basic institutions

lo_entries.subject: ENG
lo_entries.lo_text: Develop reading fluency and comprehension of short texts

lo_entries.subject: MAT
lo_entries.lo_text: Perform basic operations with algebraic expressions and solve one-step equations

lo_entries.subject: PHY
lo_entries.lo_text: Describe properties of waves and basic sound concepts

lo_entries.subject: ENG
lo_entries.lo_text: Recognize and use high-frequency academic vocabulary in context
